thread.title: Former Wolf Pack star Mike Senior dies at 43
thread.title_full: Former Wolf Pack star Mike Senior dies at 43

title: Former Wolf Pack star Mike Senior dies at 43
text: Share Updated: 6:07 pm RENO, Nev. (MyNews4.com & KRNV) -- Former Nevada football star Mike Senior died at the age of 43 after a long bout with cancer.Senior, a wide receiver from Richmond, California, played for the Wolf Pack from 1991 to 1994. He was part of three championship teams in the Big Sky and Big West conferences.He finished his career with 2,074 receiving yards -- 15th all-time at Nevada -- and 11 touchdowns.Senior was part of the University of Nevada IT organization since 2007, and News 4 has been told that he maintained his positive attitude through his illness.
